title: Language Filter On Without My Permission ?
body: So when the new patch came out,whenever someone types something in the chat thats "offensive" it gets censored,i do not have the language filter on,so whats up with that? i really wanna know what people say when they tilt so i can tilt them even more :D (Some players really deserve it)

replies.body:
We've seen a few reports on the language filter not toggling, but you can change it manually as a workaround.  

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

Let me know if that helps!
